meanings.definition: A type of backpack or knapsack.
meanings.sent1: I carry my books in my mochilas to school.
meanings.sent2: The hikers packed their mochilas with snacks and water for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous squirrel found a tiny mochilas and pretended to go on a journey.
meanings.sent4: Her mochilas was a treasure trove of memories from her travels.
meanings.sent5: The colorful mochilas stood out in the sea of bags at the airport.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the Spanish word for backpack.
meanings.sent1: In Spain, many students use mochilas to carry their books.
meanings.sent2: The mochilas of the tourists were filled with souvenirs from the trip.
meanings.sent3: The mochilas were having a party in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: The mochilas of knowledge carried by the wise old owl.
meanings.sent5: The mochilas lined up neatly against the wall, ready for the next adventure.
